original_title: DR. BEN CRAZY or: How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Seedless Watermelon
overview: An African American 5 Star General sends his US Air Force Wing to attack Russia in hopes that Russia will retaliate because he believes the evolution of the watermelon means the elimination of black people.
title: DR. BEN CRAZY or: How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Seedless Watermelon
